scripts.build: yarn run client:build && yarn run server:build
scripts.client:build: mkdir -p build/client && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js --bail --json > build/client/webpack.stats.json
scripts.server:build: mkdir -p build/server && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.server.js --bail --json > build/server/webpack.stats.json
scripts.server:prod: yarn run build && NODE_ENV=production node src/server/index.js
